---
Help: Material Bifuraction by pallet ratio for PTL CASE delivery types & quantity unit as
Suites: pg2
Test
---
!** Description
MDM Materials will have "PCE PER BOX" and "Pallet" details
Eg, If PCE PER BOX = 10 and PALLET = 100, then 10 pieces makes one box and 100 such boxes makes one pallet. i.e 1000 pieces makes 1 pallet

Conversions covered :
    case: 'cases'
    cases: 'cases'
    st: 'cases'
    kar: 'cases'
    ctn: 'cases'
    it: 'pieces'
    each: 'pieces'
    
PTL PER-Case Single Order Multiple material and Muliple Order single materials each.
